entry.title: one single glimpse of relief
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,336Chapters: 4/20Kudos: 35

Summary: "What if I never get better? What if I always feel like this?" Buck finally looks back up at him, vulnerability and compassion clear on his too-expressive face. "I don't know," he says honestly. "I don't‚Ä¶" he shudders, gives a tiny shrug of his shoulders and tries again. "I don't have an answer for that, man. It's been seven months for me and I still feel‚Ä¶like this." "Like what?" Buck just shrugs again, then mumbles, "Not myself." And Eddie doesn't know what to say to that either, because this is the only version of Buck he's ever known.Or: Buck and Eddie meet at grief group.

entry.title: War Of Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: miladystark

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,555Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 494

Summary: Lieutenant Commander Evan Buckley has survived war zones, covert missions, and enough explosions to fill a lifetime‚Äîbut nothing prepared him for Staff Sergeant Eddie Diaz, the army medic with a sharp tongue and zero regard for rank. They clash, they fight, they bleed‚Äîand somewhere between they start to fall. Slowly. Stupidly. Against all odds. Because in a world where every second counts, love is the one thing they never trained for. ¬† Sergeant Eddie Diaz didn‚Äôt look up until he heard boots and yelling. ‚ÄúCareful!‚Äù he said, deadpan, as the team deposited Buck‚Äîstill resisting‚Äîonto the cot. ‚ÄúWe wouldn‚Äôt want to bruise his ego any further.‚Äù ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre the medic?‚Äù Buck growled, glaring up at the man with messy curls and sharp eyes. ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù Eddie replied dryly, pulling on gloves. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm the fairy godmother. You got a wish?‚Äù

entry.title: One Hour at a Time (Just Because We Met)
entry.summary:
Author: Salve_El_Atun

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,293Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: At 23, Buck and Eddie collide in a bar ‚ÄîBuck a wanderer seeking home, Eddie a soldier escaping shadows. Their intense week ends abruptly when Eddie learns he's a father, choosing duty over love out of fear without telling Buck. Four years of separation shape them: Buck finds family in the LAFD amid injuries and loss, Eddie survives war, parenthood, and heartbreak in Texas before moving to LA. When they meet again, truths unravel, and old flames reignite.This story is inspired by "23" by Morat.

entry.title: The Haunting of Evan Buckley
entry.summary:
Author: AnotherNova

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 99,749Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 127

Summary: ‚ÄúBut I did warn you. Don‚Äôt say I didn‚Äôt. You got your hopes up‚Äî‚Äù ‚Äú‚ÄîThe odds were good,‚Äù Phillip interrupts. ‚ÄúWe weighed our choices and‚Äîyou know what, no, we‚Äôre not talking about this again. Especially not here.‚Äù ‚ÄúDid you?‚Äù Diane cuts in. ‚ÄúWeigh your options?‚Äù She nods towards where Evan is examining the green stains on his hands and Valerie snorts a laugh when he stamps his small handprint onto the tablecloth. ‚ÄúHe was a saviour sibling. Now what is he? What will you tell him?‚Äù ‚ÄúWe tell him nothing,‚Äù Margaret sighs to rid her chest of the burden of hospital air. She wraps her arms around herself to sculpt an embrace her mother has yet to give her. ‚ÄúWe lost Daniel. We lost our baby boy.‚Äù Her voice breaks at the last word, and she lowers her head. ‚ÄúYou still have your family,‚Äù says her father Arthur, a quiet, hopeful man. But his daughter shakes her head. ‚ÄúNot without him. Not anymore.‚Äù ¬† OR: A telling of the untold, of the moments between postcards, of the ghost at Buck's shoulder, of the day he said the q-word, of the day he said 'I do'. A rewrite of the show up until season 5 where, eventually, Buck finds a place to call home. updates every other week

entry.title: the days of begging and the days of theft
entry.summary:
Author: greencreekwolf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,462Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Bobby is a corpse. The mere thought is revolting. But it's the truth and it's all he can see. Rot covers the edges of Bobby, black and dark green, bubbling up beneath the skin near his ears and at his throat, coating his fingers so they look like they've been dipped in oil. Wrong wrong wrong. It beats like a pulse. A bloody rhythm. Bobby is a corpse. Wrong wrong wrong. Dead. Wrong wrong wrong. Alive. Wrong wrong wrong. Both. Wrong wrong wrong. or, bobby's ghost haunts buck and eddie

entry.title: A Year Of You And Me
entry.summary:
Author: LibbyWrites

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,341Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 14

Summary: In spite of his skepticism, Eddie decides to start journaling, following his therapist's advice. The man gives him a list of 365 prompts and questions to write about each day, to help him untangle the mess his brain has become. Under the knots, he might find much more than just peace of mind.
